availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Jackson (Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, carpenter. )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, carpenter. North Carolina native. Married to Martha Jackson. Father of Thomas Jackson, Macy E. Jackson, Minerva Jackson, John D. Jackson, George M. Jackson, William Jackson, and Garland C. Jackson. House carpenter in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 125A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 598.
